content: I'm importing UK reference tables into a HAPI FHR terminology server. Many of import files have OID's, I can handle most of them but have a few which refer to hl7.org OID's but some are UK specific OID's. e.g. Hosopital Service has OID 2.16.840.1.113883.12.69 which refers to Health Level 7 (HL7) version 2.x Hospital service used in chapter(s) 3 Hospital service
This is a UK question but want to confirm the OID allocated to import file is wrong. Should it not point to a UK OID not a hl7.org OID?
I think you have to ask HL7 UK. I don't know how to have an opinion about this?

@Richard Kavanagh am I seeing a legacy problem? OID's for newer hl7v2/3 vocab sets are ok, the older ones refer to international hl7 OID's [I'm trying to filter out international valuesets/vocabulary and just process UK valuesets]
@Grahame Grieve thanks. It's more of an OID question and more I look at it, it's NHS England/Digital issue
